title: Charges Dropped Against Adnan Syed in 'Serial' Case
itunes:title: Charges Dropped Against Adnan Syed in 'Serial' Case
description:
Maryland Assistant Public Defender Erica Suter, the attorney for Adnan Syed whose case was chronicled in the hit podcast "Serial," discusses Syed's release after serving more than two decades in prison for murder and his fight to prove his innocence.
Leon Fresco, a partner at Holland & Knight, discusses the latest circuit court ruling which leaves Dreamers in limbo once again.
June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
